question: when did sussex split into east and west
vanilla_rag_result:
The passages you provided all relate to the topic of when Sussex split into East and West Sussex. However, since the specific details from the passages are not included, I can provide a general answer based on historical knowledge.

Sussex was officially divided into East Sussex and West Sussex in 1974 as part of the Local Government Act 1972. Prior to that, Sussex was a single county. If you need more specific information or details from the passages, please provide the text of those passages.
